features: Fabric type Shell: 100% Polyamide; Lining: 100% Polyamide; Filling: 100% Polyester
Care instructions Machine wash in cold water using mild detergent only. Tumble dry low. For best results, hang dry in a ventilated area.

Origin SIZE GUIDE & FIT: The model is wearing Size XS (Height: 5'8"/ Weight: 115 lbs/ Bust: 33"). IMPORTANT: Based on customer feedback that this jacket runs large, we have corrected the garment sizing to make it true to size, but pls notice that some colors are the old versions that would be too big if you order your normal size. Pls read the TWO GARMENT SIZE CHARTS in the last product image and product description to find your suitable size. If in doubt, please feel free to contact us. Thank you!
Fur description Machine wash in cold water using mild detergent only. Tumble dry low. For best results, hang dry in a ventilated area.

THERMOLITE INFRARED TECHNOLOGY: This women's long puffer jacket with highly compressible double thermal insulation features our unique THERMOLITE INFRARED technology that is solar-activated by the sun, or artificial light source to keep you warm without being bulky in a variety of fall and winter conditions.

KEEPS YOU WARM WHEN WET: This women's winter coat is ultra-light and warm, padded with THERMOLITE NIR Balls which feature a new insulation technology. It keeps you warmer than down in cold and wet weather.

Ultra lightweight/Breathable/Water resistant/Windproof/Packable: This puffer coat with hood for women offers protective insulation from the elements for outdoor enthusiasts and delivers exceptional warmth and breathability.It's very light and packable for traveling, hiking,camping and other outdoor activities, suitable for cold rainy, snowy and windy weather.

Practical features: The attached hood with elastic is lined and warm and gives sufficient protection around the face without being bulky and tight; Tricot-lined zip pockets keep your hands warm and comfortable, great for keys, phone, wallet and other small items; The elastic sleeve cuffs prevent cold air getting in for wind protection; Dual zippers allow room for your hips when sitting and make it easy getting in and out of the car.

There are two length options: hip length(Avg. 32”) and knee length(Avg. 36”). Pls check the size chart for the exact center back length. Jackets are designed to be semi-fitted however sizing runs LARGE in order to allow for layering underneath. Pls read the SIZE GUIDE in the last product image to find your suitable size before purchase. If in doubt and looking for tighter fit, then size down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THERMOLITE THERMOLITE provides thermal insulation and comfort in cold weather despite its lightweight feature. Thermolite ensures warmth and comfort without adding weight in dry and wet conditions. It is a lightweight fibre with extreme performance. Hollow core fibre technology offers the best insulation properties without extra weight. The wearer stays dry due to the fact that the fibre dries 20% faster than other insulation textiles and 50% faster than cotton. Thermolite is a superb material for the layering system of clothing due to its comfortable and lightweight properties allowing greater freedom of movement.

KEY FEATURES: THERMOLITE INFRARED technology is an innovative solution that is solar-activated by the sun, or artificial light sources, using a unique blend of near infrared (NIR) yarns with proprietary additives. The yarns absorb the NIR rays to raise the temperature of the garment, while the system’s integrated high-quality insulation traps air, and minimizes heat loss, to help optimize performance in freezing temperatures.THERMOLITE INFRARED technology lasts the lifespan of a garment and does not wash off.Delivers superior lightweight warmth in cold and wet conditions.Excellent recovery power after compression.Outstanding breathability.Washing durability and quick-drying performanceKeeps you warm and dry, longer.

Internal Elastic Cuffs The elastic sleeve cuffs prevent cold air getting in for wind protection. Water Resistant This insulated jacket for women offers protective insulation from the elements for outdoor enthusiasts and delivers exceptional warmth and breathability. 2-Way Zipper Dual zippers allow room for your hips when sitting and make it easy getting in and out of the car.

IMPORTANT: Based on customer feedback that this jacket runs large, we have corrected the garment sizing to make it true to size, but pls notice that some colors are the old versions that would be too big if you order your normal size. Pls read the TWO GARMENT SIZE CHARTS in the last product image and product description to find your suitable size.

IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT SIZING IMPORTANT: Based on customer feedback that this jacket runs large, we have corrected the garment sizing to make it true to size, but pls notice that some colors are the old versions that would be too big if you order your normal size. Pls read the TWO GARMENT SIZE CHARTS in the last product image and product description to find your suitable size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For sizing, listen to the seller, not Amazon's suggestion
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First, this is a beautiful jacket. I have the longer one though I had so much trouble deciding between the two, I may buy the shorter one in a different color if this proves to be warm enough for Michigan winters. The herringbone pattern of the puffs seems to be unique to this coat at this time and is one of the most flattering "v shaped" silhouettes one could wish for - especially in a winter coat. A puffer, no less! I do not like the look of most puffer jackets. The puffs all go straight across which makes your body look wider. Not this coat~! The gorgeous cascading v cuts your figure even if you aren't "cut". My body shape in this coat resembles (a much larger) Marilyn Monroe hourglass shape. I'm still losing weight (fasting and keto) and will probably buy smaller sizes if they keep selling these.Sizing: Amazon suggested a 3x for me, which is not available and would have been too large. My current measurements are 48"-44"-50" and the seller recommended which fits perfectly:Size: XX-Large | Color: （runs Large. Order Size Down) Ink Blue(shiny)-avg.36" Long LengthThe sleeves are very, very long. I have shorter arms and need blocks in yoga for some poses, too, though. I also don't always wear gloves, so really appreciate the longer sleeves. They can be pushed up a bit a la '80's or even rolled up.The hood is delightful. It truly blocks the wind and I was able to pull it over my ears and go without my constant ear muffs. Huge plus! It also is very light and doesn't get behind your neck or bother you when it's down.Quality on this is outstanding. This is one of the best zippers I've seen on a coat. It has no hanging threads or threats of coming apart any time soon! Again, the style is just fantastic, too! It would be nice if the pockets were fully lined for they are a bit rough on one side, but that's nitpicking! Compare the price of this coat to others in its class with far inferior styling and you'll have it in your cart before you know it!I will update this to address warmth as the season changes. I know people always say that and don't, but I do. lol Hope this helps!Lightweight. Extremely lightweight. I'm kind of skeptical that it will keep me warm during a Michigan winter, but like a review from Minnesota, we shall see and even if it's only for Fall and Spring, it's a beautiful jacket. I will not return it. I am hoping the technology mentioned works. I use an NIR light therapy and it's magical, so I am very hopeful.Update: this cost has been surprisingly warm during 20 below zero 50 mph winds. I won’t say it encouraged me to camp in the backyard, but going from house to car and running my dog in the backyard was doable! Whatever this technology is, it’s amazing because you can wear this inside the store and also not get hot. I don’t know if it’s warm enough to walk to school, etc outside longer than like 10-15 minutes, but it’s performing better than I expected.2nd Update: My measurements are now basically 45" - 39"- 45" - this coat still fits when I roll the sleeves a bit and it's very roomy. I'm going to buy another one in either Teal or Olive and thinking about the shorter style for the new coat. Looks like the sizing will be different for Olive than Teal. This Ink Blue is a terrific color and still looks and functions fantastically after almost 1 yr. Excellent wind blocking capabilities!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat! Feels of good quality. Strong zipper. Perfect length. Easy to pack when traveling. Love the added hood. It's light weight but also very warm. It also has warm and deep zipped side pockets for your cell phone or whatevers. I think it's a very classy style. I ordered a large, I normally wear a 12 so it's true to size. I have lots of coats but this is my favorite go to coat for everywhere! ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great jacket but runs small
reviews.reviewText: This jacket was everything I was looking for—lightweight, not down, an interior pocket, longer length, hood…unfortunately, I wear a 3x and while sometimes a 3x can be a little big on me, the size of this one was just too snug. It just fit, so there would not be enough room for a bulkier sweater. I was disappointed because it’s so hard to find all of those features!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coat is very light but warm with a sweater layer.
reviews.reviewText: Great mid winter coat. Very light but warm. Not too bulky and has. Nice line.Hood is not too bothersome. Very nice green color. I like it a lot. I am 5’4”, 125lbs. Ordered petite small, perfect fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good thin winter jacket
reviews.reviewText: I bought this 11 months ago and it's fulfilling my needs. It's relatively thin and pretty lightweight and can be packed away for travel if needed. It's great for temps in the 50s, works fine in the 40s, and I even wear it in the 30s, you just have to add the right scarf and gloves, etc. The hood fits well, the part that goes over your chin is soft, and the zippers are still working well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs very small
reviews.reviewText: I usually wear a large, I ordered an extra large based on the reviews. I am 5'6" and weigh approx 170 lbs. I have wide hips, pear shaped. The lower half of the coat is tight. Its ok when i stand but I'm afraid if I zip up the coat and then try to sit, it is going to destroy the coat. So, I will be returning I guess for an XXL or time to hit the gym. Possibly ordering a different coat.The coat I did receive is very warm in cooler weather. I have worn it in feels like Temps of 20 degrees with wind chills and very light snow so far just to see if the coat was warm. Stepped outside the house. Coat kept me warm and toasty. I do wish that the coat had a cloth lining which I thought it did when I ordered. The hood is a good size, not too big not too small and didn't blow off in the big winds we had. It's just ok. Kind of thin and very light weight and soft. But I will be returning and ordering a different coat. I really need a lining inside the coat, hood and pockets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Other reviews are right..coat runs large, order size down!
reviews.reviewText: Really love this coat! The shiny blue looks so pretty. Great NorthFace dupe-not gonna gatekeep. Looks designer, feels light but definitely warm. It’s a perfect packing coat for warm to cold trips if need be. 5’8”-133#s Medium was a bit large for me, exchanged for a small. BUY IT!! You won’t regret the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but very light weight
reviews.reviewText: This is not a winter jacket, but I still like it. The hood works great and stays put in the wind and is very water resistant. I stayed dry in the rain. Makes a great warm raincoat, but not a great cold protector. I am keeping it because it fits as an in between jacket which I did not have.
The jacket is surprisingly warm for how lightweight it is. It is a very nice fit. My favorite jacket for shopping because it is so lightweight.

The measurements matched and the coat was a perfect travelling companion. There’s no weight to it, compactable on flights and doesn’t look wrinkled. Comfortable and stylish. Was good for cooler temperatures and damp conditions.Unsure about real winter cold temperatures yet.
